parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Slurm",
  "software": [
    "Tensorflow 1.13.1 with Horovod support",
    "Python"
  ],
  "resource_requirements": {
    "nodes": 2,
    "tasks": 8,
    "cpus_per_task": 6,
    "memory": "64G",
    "gpus_per_node": 4,
    "gpu_type": "v100",
    "time_limit": "72:00:00",
    "project": "project_name"
  }
}
```

The script is running on a Slurm cluster. It uses Tensorflow 1.13.1 with Horovod support and Python to run the training process. 

The script requests 2 nodes, 8 tasks, 6 CPU cores per task, 64GB of memory, and 4 GPUs per node (v100 type). The training process is set to run for a maximum of 72 hours and uses the project "project_name". The script also includes commands to log the output and error messages to specified files.
